lines.text: V Change in Fair Value of Assets
1 Plan Assets at the Beginning of Period 386.04
7 Plan Assets at the End of Period
The estimates of future salary increases, considered in actuarial valuations take account of inflation, seniority, promotion
and other relevant factors such as supply and demand factors in the employment market.
as a % of the Total Plan Assets
" In the absence of detailed information regarding plan assets which is funded with Insurance Companies,
the composition of each major category of plan assets, the percentage or amount for each category to the fair value
of plan assets has not been disclosed.
vill Basis used to determine the Expected Rate of Return on Plan Assets
The expected rate of return on plan assets is based on the current portfolio of assets, investment strategy and market scenario.
In order to protect the capital and optimise returns within acceptable risk parameters, the plan assets are well diversified.
Amounts towards Defined Contribution Plans have been recognised under "Contribution to Provident and Other Funds" in Schedule 17.
